document_data.name: ''Ballads of the People''
document_data.author: [[Hamlaer Dunther]]
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Ballads of the People''''' was a collection of folk songs recorded by Way-Minstrel [[Hamlaer Dunther]] and published in the {{YearlinkName|1376}}.
document_data.Description: The ''[[Old Sailors' Chant of the Sword Coast]]'' was among the shanties put to page in the book. The song taught all to search for safe harbor in storm as they could topple even the strongest of castles.
